snippet.title: CTRL/ESC - Survival Horror Indie Game Trailer
snippet.description:
|| DOWNLOAD GAME AT: https://gelapt.itch.io/ctrlesc ||

«During the summer vacation, a maintenance technician is hired by the Pandora School of Engineering and Technology to repair and calibrate the equipment that was damaged. However, after making a mistake and making the light go down, strange events begin to happen in the deserted school. Now, the technician's goal is to discover the cause of the apparent haunt and stop it before it gets in danger.»

CTRL/ESC is a short Survival Horror game.





Credits:
Track: “Phobia”
Music by Elysium Audio Labs
https://www.elysiumaudiolabs.com
https://bit.ly/2QmAxRW 
https://youtu.be/a5N99v5VmPk
